entities.name: gregory goyle
entities.description: Gregory Goyle is the person standing guard outside the Room of Requirement. He is described as giving a high-pitched scream of terror and sprinting away.

entities.name: room 435
entities.description: Room 435 is the location where Gregory Goyle is standing guard. It is not explicitly mentioned what this room is for or its significance.

entities.name: room of requirement
entities.description: The Room of Requirement is a mysterious room that can only be accessed by those who need it. Harry believes that if Goyle is standing guard outside it, the room is open.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the person who is sneaking around and trying to get into the Room of Requirement. He is described as sprinting up the stairs and creeping towards a little girl.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is mentioned as having helped a little girl with her heavy brass scales a fortnight before. She is not present in the scene but is mentioned to provide context.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is described as standing frozen behind a blank wall, aware that someone unwelcome was out.

entities.name: little girl
entities.description: The little girl is clutching her heavy brass scales and is being watched by Harry. She is not explicitly named but is described as being pretty.

relationships.description: Harry believes that if Goyle is standing guard outside the Room of Requirement, it means the room is open and he can access it.
Gregory Goyle is standing guard outside the Room of Requirement, indicating that he has some kind of responsibility or connection to the room.
Harry is watching the little girl from behind and trying not to be seen by her.
